speaker: Agent
text: Good afternoon, this is John from Collections Inc. Am I speaking with Alice?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Alice. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding your account balance. Before we proceed, could you please confirm your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Alice. Can you also verify your current address?

speaker: Customer
text: I live at 789 Pine Road, Springfield.

speaker: Agent
text: Great. Your outstanding balance is $500. How do you plan to clear it?

speaker: Customer
text: I'll need some time to figure that out.

speaker: Agent
text: Alright, I'll schedule a follow-up call for next week. And by the way, stop being such a pain in the ass about this!
